full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA RNAMS MNYES PAR BYED PA'I BSANGS MCHOD BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B (RGYAL BA KUN DNGOS PADMA THOD PHRENG RTZAL GYI GSUNG LAS BYUNG BA'I BSANGS YIG RDO RJE'I TSIG RNAMS BYIN RLABS KYI TSAN KA TSE BZHIN DU, BDAG DANG BDAG 'DRAS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I RIGS 'DI 'DRA LA DGOS PA MI 'DUG NA'ANG, BOD SOG GI SKAD GNYIS SMRA ZHING MANG DU THOS PA LA DGA' BA'I DBYOD LDAN, MIR RGAN BKA' BCU SHES RAB RGYA MTSO DANG, CHE CHEN DPON PO BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GNYIS KYIS NAN DU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN, BSANGS KYI YI GE BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SLOB DPON CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I BSANGS GZHUNG LHO BYANG GI GTER KHA DU MA LAS BYUNG BA LA GZHI BYAS, 'KHYER @021A *, ,BDE BA'I PHYIR DU BDAG CHEN RIN PO CHE RGYA GAR SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA DANG 'GA' ZHIG CHA MTHUN PAR BYAS TE, ZA HOR GYI RIGS LAS AA WADHU TI PA'I BTZUN PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS CHU 'GO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL BA DANG ZUNG DU 'BREL BA'I LHA RTZE GZHUNG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SMON 'GRO PAn CHEN NO, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO,
